xtiny-doc-page.title: Bookmarks
xtiny-doc-page.paragraph: Bookmarks are placed in the tabbed pane called "Bookmarks" on the left part of the interface. This panel shows four buttons and a tree. The tree contains your bookmarks. These bookmarks are pointers, specified by you, to your most frequently accessed files.

Using the buttons, you can create a folder, add selected opened file to the current folder, add all the opened files to current folder and remove selected file/folder. The remove button works if several items are selected (use Shift and Control keys combined to mouse clicks).

To add a file to a given folder, either use the second and third buttons or drag and drop files onto a folder. To open a file from a folder, double-click it or select it and press ENTER. You can also select several files to open them at once. All the folders you've defined are saved with their contents on Jext exit.
